name: Plants vs Bots (pvz like)
description:
Plants vs Zombies has great memorys for all of us, and one thing that got pretty lost is the multiplayer that ps3 and xbox 360 had.

I created this game that works just like pvz but it has multiplayer again and it is actually not pvz.

The game has co-op mode, VS mode and Singleplayer.

after a game you get a "... wins" screen. youll have to reopen the game for now.

Future updates

There will be music and more sounds added

There will be a level/story mode where you play levels and unlock plants fighting the robots, there wont be a shop, zen garden or anything besides the main thing.

There will be mini game levels/modes.
